trans-unit.source: Contoso sends sales order messages to Northwind using this schema.
trans-unit.target: Contoso sends sales order messages to Northwind using this schema.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Schema Editor (<link xlink:href="70201659-05a5-44e2-9245-58f9a67345c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Tools for Creating Message Schemas</link>) to build this schema or download the schema at <externalLink><linkText>MSDN Code Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=316856</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Schema Editor (<link xlink:href="70201659-05a5-44e2-9245-58f9a67345c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Tools for Creating Message Schemas</link>) to build this schema or download the schema at <externalLink><linkText>MSDN Code Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=316856</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the project name (EAIEDITutorial), select <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and then select <embeddedLabel>New Item</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the project name (EAIEDITutorial), select <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>, and then select <embeddedLabel>New Item</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In <embeddedLabel>Add New Item</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Schema</embeddedLabel>, name it <userInput>ECommerceSalesOrder</userInput>, and then select <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <embeddedLabel>Add New Item</embeddedLabel>, select <embeddedLabel>Schema</embeddedLabel>, name it <userInput>ECommerceSalesOrder</userInput>, and then select <embeddedLabel>Add</embeddedLabel>.
